title: You've found something special at Aster Meadow Apartments! 1 bed, 1 bath.
neighborhood: Near Bridgewood Park & White Bear Lake
posting_body: ['Aster Meadow Apartments', '4143-4145 Centerville Rd', 'Vadnais Heights, MN 55127', 'A wonderful home in Vadnais Heights is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1465 - $1685 per month.', 'This unit comes with 814 - 909 sq ft.', 'Aster Meadow luxury apartments is a brand new building that offers the perfect balance of sophisticated lifestyle and prime location in Vadnais Heights.', 'Our spacious living arrangements combine luxurious comfort with first-class amenities - such as heated, underground parking, conference rooms, a 24/7 fitness center, movie theater, and a stunning heated courtyard and grill area for entertaining.', 'Choose from studio, 1 and 2 bedroom dwellings, all with beautiful plank flooring, quartz countertops, in-unit washer/dryers, modern cabinetry, and an inviting view that welcomes you home.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '✓ Bike Racks', '✓ Conference Room', '✓ Controlled Access', '✓ Emergency Maintenance', '✓ FOB Controlled Building Access', '✓ Garden Plaza', '✓ Library', '✓ Outdoor Courtyard', '✓ Playground', '✓ Walking/Biking Trails', '✓ 16-Acre View Of Natural Wetland', '✓ Brand New Appliances', '✓ Heated Gazebo', '✓ Heated Underground Parking', '✓ Large Grill Area', '✓ On Site Management & Maintenance', '✓ Outdoor Fireplace, Fire Table & Kitchen', '✓ Party Room', '✓ Pet Wash Station', '✓ Private Offices', 'Unit Highlights:', '✓ Balcony/Patio', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Central Heating & Cooling', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Ice Maker', '✓ Oven', '✓ Pantry', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Wi-Fi', '✓ Den', '✓ Extra Large Walk-In Closets', '✓ Gorgeous View', '✓ Granite/Quartz Countertops', '✓ High-Speed Internet Access: Cable & Century OnLink Ready', '✓ Office', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', '✓ Storage Lockers Available', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', 'Variable, Monthly, 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed.', 'Maximum Dogs: 2, Maximum Cats: 1, Maximum weight: 60 lbs., Initial fee: 300, Additional rent: $50, Deposit: $300', 'Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '69A708EFC8A749FF']
